About Me

Please allow me to introduce myself

Hello, I'm Eren

I am currently in my second year of studies as a Computer Science student at Carleton University in Ottawa, Ontario.

Listed below are a few of my hobbies so you could get to know me better.

Further below that you can navigate through my various projects; whether they are hackathon projects, personal endeavors, or otherwise.

Hobby 1

I am a big fan of music and also an avid guitar player. I particularly like to play the electric guitar on clean settings, however I also have a soft spot for some banger acoustic songs. I listen mostly to anything from the late 60’s to the 80’s, and my favourite artists include Pink Floyd, David Bowie, Queen, The Doors, and countless others.
